name: Invopop
headline: We help global software companies comply with local tax reporting
description:
Invopop helps global software companies comply with local tax reporting requirements.
We offer an API that records every sale and reports it to the appropriate tax authority in the right format.  

In the last years, +15 countries have started to require businesses to report to tax authorities every sale, in real-time (e.g., India, Mexico, Brazil). This regulatory trend is catching up, as +20 countries will introduce this new regulation in the next 3 years (e.g., Germany, France, Australia, China).

We help companies comply with this.

founders.name: Sam Lown, Founder
founders.description: Software developer. CTO Founder of Cabify, Spain's first tech unicorn.

generated_description:
**Invopop: Simplifying Global Tax Compliance for Software Companies**

Invopop is a dynamic startup founded in 2021, based in Madrid, Spain, and part of Y Combinator Batch W23. Its mission? To help global software companies navigate the increasingly complex landscape of local tax reporting. As governments worldwide implement real-time sales reporting—over 20 countries are expected to jump on this bandwagon in the next three years—Invopop stands ready to provide a critical service.

The company offers a powerful API that automates sales recording and ensures that invoices comply with the specific requirements of various jurisdictions. It’s designed for businesses that want to expand globally without the headaches of managing local invoicing intricacies.

Currently, Invopop's services cover 25 countries, transforming sales into compliant invoices and reporting them directly to tax authorities in the correct format. This functionality is particularly appealing as companies look to stay ahead of forthcoming regulations in markets like Germany, France, and Australia.

The product caters to a range of industries including global software companies, billing solutions, marketplaces, and vertical SaaS applications. Whether you're determining VAT, issuing compliance invoices, handling credit notes, or managing invoicing for third parties, Invopop has you covered.

With a small but efficient team of six, including notable Group Partner Michael Seibel, Invopop is already trusted by fast-growing companies that issue millions of invoices a month. Their approach is characterized by flexibility—users can easily customize invoicing workflows to suit specific business needs.

In a world where compliance is becoming the norm, Invopop positions itself not just as a tool but as a partner in business growth, enabling companies to focus on their core competencies while leaving tax complexity to the experts. 

For a deeper dive into how Invopop can help streamline your tax reporting processes, visit their website at [invopop.com](https://www.invopop.com).
